subject: Couple files from today
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
I thought i would give the Sony Walkman a go today.  Got a couple, but 
i think using different radios everday is starting to confuse them.  I 
will pick my favorite and start using one primary box after this i 
think.  It's just not fair to our friends on the other side, they are 
the ones that have to adjust to each radio.

-Steve H.
